author: fwyzard
body:
#### PR description:

Implement setting parameters of `FWCore.ParameterSet.Mixins.PrintOptions` in the constructor.

Clean up all calls of `dumpPython(...)` that were using the wrong parameter type (`None` or a string instead of a `PrintOptions` object).

Ths PR is a prerequisite for #27305 .

#### PR validation:

All unit tests pass.
title: Fix usage of PrintOptions
